data.name: Return of the Video Dead - Demon in the Shell
data.detailed_description:
"a Horror FPS, Hide & Seek Game, essentially it's like a modern version of PacMan"


You are trapped in an abandoned arcade hall. The Ghosts of the Arcade, the good ones revealed to you what you have to do, to escape.
You gotta collect coins...
As long as you collect coins, you are vulnerable to the demonic presence that lingers in the arcade.

The collected coins can be used to play real games on arcade machines.




Play Games Like For Example:
  • 2d Fighter
  • Sidescroller
  • Shoot 'Em Up


While playing an arcade game your goal is to get a high score on the arcade machine. Once you get a high score, the Ghost of the Machine will reveal a secret message that you can use to open a safe or a locked door...


But be careful, the demonic presence is everywhere, it will surprise you by its appearance.
Watch out for sheets resembling the shape of a covered stool, chair or even a arcade machine. The demon is all around you, watching you.

So will you be able to get a high score to unlock your freedom?
Wishlist now and you'll be able to find out soon enough!


please Do Note:

This game is a Work in Progress, the Screenshots you see are not representing the actual gameplay, they are just to fill the gap.
Updates will be made on a regular basis.
Thank you for your understanding and for the support

data.short_description: A Haunted Arcade, collect coins to play games to avoid getting haunted by the Demon that haunts this place. Shadows will scare you, voices will make you jump, avoid the ghostÂ´s that roam this place by hiding. Will you be able to get a highscore?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 Or Later
  • Processor: 2.4GHZ Dual Core Processor Or Higher
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GT Or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64-bit Recommended, 32-bit Supported
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.4 GHZ Quad Core Processor Or Higher
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 460 Or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Insert Coin!
